sub_title: Mandarin Chinese & Physics teacher at Visser 't Hooft Lyceum tto bilingual secondary school in Leiden
summary:
I am specialised and qualified in teaching (Business) Mandarin and Chinese Culture, and am developing teaching materials and exams for specific target groups. I also specialise in methods of differentiation in education, and in coaching talented students, especially those who are (highly) gifted.

* Certified teacher for secondary education (eerstegraads bevoegd)
